DataElement.preferredName: Person Eye Drops Use Assessment Description Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being._The organ of sight or vision._A liquid preparation which has to be administered in a drop-wise fashion, in doses measured by drops._Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._The words of something written.

Property.preferredDefinition: The organ of sight or vision. (On-line Medical Dictionary):A popular term for a medicine taken in doses measured by drops.
